originalText.text: If I could give zero stars I would. I took my daughter here over a month ago and he still had yet to return my call with next steps. After my 5th call to the office HIS NURSE read the notes from the bloodwork with showed MAJOR CONCERNS to me. As a woman of color these behaviors are what we fear because we aren’t safe in healthcare and his actions showed exactly why. To further confirm how POC are dismissed, I left 4 additional messages with his superiors and still nothing. I’ve left over 8 messages in total. I wouldn’t trust this man to treat my kid at this point. However, POC DESERVE to be treated with care and the same thorough care you’d give others.

originalText.text: Very good doctor he sees me already for 3 years and I appreciate for everything what he does

originalText.text: Amazing bedside manner. He is wonderful with all his patients, understanding, compassionate truly amazing doctor. I recommend anyone with diabetes go see him. Won't regret having him for your doctor.

originalText.text: The absolute worst. Kept saying things to make us just nervous enough to come back for visits that turned out to be unnecessary. No-showed for 2 appointments.
